title.rendered: ZKTECO AL20DB LEVER LOCK WITH TOUCH SCREEN AND BLUETOOTH-FINGERPRINT

content.rendered:
The AL20DB comes with a Lock Out Mode where all normal users (other than admin) will be locked out, Voice Guide Programming that is easy to program and supports Portuguese, Spanish and English.

Features

  • User Capacity : 100
  • Password Capacity : 100
  • Fingerprint Capacity : 100
  • Wireless Module : BLE4.0
  • Power Supply : 4×AA Alkaline battery (NOT supplied)
  • Material : Zinc Alloy
  • Door Thickness : 30-54 mm
  • Mortise Type : German Mortis
